meta.description: Optimize the number of shifts on bikes and scooters to maximize tips while meeting order, energy, and shift constraints.

params.name: orders_per_shift
params.description: Number of orders delivered per shift

vars.name: shifts
vars.description: Number of shifts scheduled for each type of transportation

objective.name: max_total_tips
objective.expr: sum(tips_per_shift[t] * shifts[t] for t in TRANSPORT)
objective.description: Maximize total tips received from all shifts

constraints.name: total_shifts_limit
constraints.description: Total number of shifts cannot exceed 40

constraints.name: total_energy_limit
constraints.description: Total energy used cannot exceed 230 units

constraints.name: minimum_scooter_shifts
constraints.description: Must have at least 5 shifts on scooters
